message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I can do $160, which is a good compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate the compromise, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $150?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $150, but I can meet you halfway at $155. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider $145?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $152, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. That's the best I can do. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $152 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $151. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $151, but I can meet you halfway again at $153. That's the best I can do. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm not willing to go above $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time and offer $152. Can you consider that?
